"A corporation’s structure will produce better performance if and only if it improves the organization’s ability to make and execute key decisions better and faster than competitors". In other words, a reorganization is no substitute for an effective strategic plan and the people to execute the plan. Companies that literally reorganize annually (or more frequently) project a strong indication that the Board has lost control and Senior Management doesn't have a clue.
